Changelog
=========

0.0.3 (2021-08-17)
------------------

- `config.list_config()` now initializes the config dir if necessary


0.0.2 (2020-04-30)
------------------

- added `ppp-list` and `ppp-rm` tools for listing and removing profiles


0.0.1 (2020-04-28)
------------------

- initial release
